text: Ridgewood Park is a neighborhood in east Dallas Texas (USA). It is bordered by Lovers Lane on the north, Abrams Road on the west, the DART on the south, and Fisher Road on the east.Ridgewood Park - Information from the main page. Retrieved 4 November 2006. The city of Dallas' Ridgewood/Belcher Recreation Center is located in the southeastern portion of the neighborhood.Ridgewood Park - Out and About. Retrieved 4 October 2006. == References == ==External links== * Ridgewood Park
title: Ridgewood Park, Dallas
